translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理無理無理、絶対に無理だかんね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Impossible, impossible, impossible, it's absolutely impossible!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃ……魔王ランスの子供は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well... the children of Demon Lord Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰も彼もつわものばかりってのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are all said to be formidable warriors,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺だって知ってる話だけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's something even I know...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だからなんで知らねぇの！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So why don't you know that!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、確か十人くらいいるんだったかな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, if I recall correctly, there are about ten of them?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスやゼス、西ヘルマンとかの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently the children of leaders from Lizas, Zeth, West Helman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指導者の子供は大抵魔王の子らしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are mostly children of the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんなすごい強かったり、頭が良かったり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is either incredibly strong or very intelligent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中には既に国を率いている子もいるとか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and some are even already leading countries...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、どいつもこいつも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, each and every one of them

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただものじゃない奴ばかりってことよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is no ordinary person!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに仲間に出来れば……まあ、少しは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you could actually get them as allies... well, maybe a little...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にほんの少しは望みがあるかも知れない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there might be just a tiny bit of hope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でもねぇー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんなすごーく強かったり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they're all incredibly strong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごーく偉かったりするの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or incredibly important people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな奴らを一人一人、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have to go around the countries one by one and get those people

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国を巡って君が仲間にしていく？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to be your allies?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞ちゃーん……可哀想だけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eile-chan... I'm sorry, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰も君の話なんて聞いてくれずに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no one is going to listen to you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 門前払いが関の山だって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you're just going to be turned away at the gate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それとも、なんか作戦あんの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or do you have some kind of plan?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは鞄の中から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You took from your bag

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母に渡された紹介状を見せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the letter of introduction your mother gave you and showed it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、なになに？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, let's see, what is this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス宛にゼス宛に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Addressed to Lizas, to Zeth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ、もしかして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this perhaps...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界主要各国に向けた紹介状？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a letter of introduction addressed to the major countries of the world?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これで国家の王様達相手に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this, you intend to approach the kings of the nations,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供を紹介してもらうってこと？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have them introduce their children to you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰が書いたの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who wrote this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へー、＜エール＞のお母さん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, it's Eile's mother...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なるほど、なるほど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, I see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「絶対、無理ーーーーーーーーッ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Absolutely impossibleーーーーーーーーッ!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明すればするほど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The more you explained,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故か長田君のあなたを見る目は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for some reason, Nagata-kun's eyes as he looked at you

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 憐れみの色が濃くなっていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: became increasingly filled with pity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっかりあなたは長田君に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You had completely become

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭のおかしい奴だと思われてしまったようだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: someone Nagata-kun thought was crazy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （段々こいつのこと、分かってきたわ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I'm starting to understand him more and more...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （親子揃って、く、クレイジー……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Both parent and child, c-crazy...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （本当は恩を返したかったけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I really wanted to repay the favor, but...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままマジで危険な場所に行く気なら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if he's seriously planning to go to a dangerous place like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ひえー……付き合いきれねぇー……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Yikes... I can't keep up with this...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （賢い俺は、ヤバくなったら逃げっか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Smart me will run away if things get bad...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （悪ぃな＜エール＞、ベストフレンドでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Sorry, Eile, even though you’re my best friend,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命には代えられねぇんだ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't risk my life...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょーーーーーーっ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whaaaaaaaaaaat!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然長田君が叫んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly Nagata-kun shouted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょい待ち、＜エール＞ちゃん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a minute, Eile-chan!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今あんたレベル神呼んで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just now you used a level-god spell,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベルアップしなかった！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: didn’t you level up!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てーか、よく考えると神魔法も使ってね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, didn’t you even use divine magic?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「年齢的に考えると……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Considering your age...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞ちゃんおかしくね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn’t Eile-chan kind of weird?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理無理無理、絶対に無理だかんね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Impossible, impossible, impossible, it's absolutely impossible!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃ……魔王ランスの子供は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well... the children of Demon Lord Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰も彼もつわものばかりってのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are all said to be formidable warriors,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺だって知ってる話だけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's something even I know...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だからなんで知らねぇの！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So why don't you know that!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、確か十人くらいいるんだったかな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, if I recall correctly, there are about ten of them?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスやゼス、西ヘルマンとかの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently the children of leaders from Lizas, Zeth, West Helman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指導者の子供は大抵魔王の子らしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are mostly children of the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんなすごい強かったり、頭が良かったり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is either incredibly strong or very intelligent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中には既に国を率いている子もいるとか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and some are even already leading countries...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、どいつもこいつも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, each and every one of them

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただものじゃない奴ばかりってことよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is no ordinary person!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに仲間に出来れば……まあ、少しは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you could actually get them as allies... well, maybe a little...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にほんの少しは望みがあるかも知れない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there might be just a tiny bit of hope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でもねぇー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんなすごーく強かったり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they're all incredibly strong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごーく偉かったりするの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or incredibly important people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな奴らを一人一人、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have to go around the countries one by one and get those people

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国を巡って君が仲間にしていく？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to be your allies?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞ちゃーん……可哀想だけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eile-chan... I'm sorry, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰も君の話なんて聞いてくれずに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no one is going to listen to you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 門前払いが関の山だって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you're just going to be turned away at the gate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それとも、なんか作戦あんの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or do you have some kind of plan?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは鞄の中から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You took from your bag

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母に渡された紹介状を見せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the letter of introduction your mother gave you and showed it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、なになに？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, let's see, what is this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス宛にゼス宛に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Addressed to Lizas, to Zeth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ、もしかして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this perhaps...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界主要各国に向けた紹介状？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a letter of introduction addressed to the major countries of the world?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これで国家の王様達相手に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this, you intend to approach the kings of the nations,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供を紹介してもらうってこと？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have them introduce their children to you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰が書いたの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who wrote this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へー、＜エール＞のお母さん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, it's Eile's mother...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なるほど、なるほど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, I see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「絶対、無理ーーーーーーーーッ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Absolutely impossibleーーーーーーーーッ!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明すればするほど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The more you explained,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故か長田君のあなたを見る目は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for some reason, Nagata-kun's eyes as he looked at you

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 憐れみの色が濃くなっていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: became increasingly filled with pity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっかりあなたは長田君に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You had completely become

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭のおかしい奴だと思われてしまったようだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: someone Nagata-kun thought was crazy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （段々こいつのこと、分かってきたわ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I'm starting to understand him more and more...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （親子揃って、く、クレイジー……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Both parent and child, c-crazy...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （本当は恩を返したかったけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I really wanted to repay the favor, but...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままマジで危険な場所に行く気なら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if he's seriously planning to go to a dangerous place like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ひえー……付き合いきれねぇー……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Yikes... I can't keep up with this...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （賢い俺は、ヤバくなったら逃げっか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Smart me will run away if things get bad...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （悪ぃな＜エール＞、ベストフレンドでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Sorry, Eile, even though you’re my best friend,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命には代えられねぇんだ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't risk my life...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょーーーーーーっ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whaaaaaaaaaaat!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然長田君が叫んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly Nagata-kun shouted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょい待ち、＜エール＞ちゃん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a minute, Eile-chan!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今あんたレベル神呼んで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just now you used a level-god spell,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベルアップしなかった！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: didn’t you level up!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てーか、よく考えると神魔法も使ってね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, didn’t you even use divine magic?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「年齢的に考えると……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Considering your age...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞ちゃんおかしくね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn’t Eile-chan kind of weird?
